## ref() function

A directive that observes the updates a property with a reference to the element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ref: <TSource = any, TParent = any>(propertyName: keyof TSource & string) => CaptureType<TSource, TParent>
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

propertyName


</td><td>

keyof TSource &amp; string


</td><td>

The name of the property to assign the reference to.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
